title: Total wage payments indeterminate with min wage

content.question: Assume that the government imposes an effective minimum wage in a perfectly competitive labor market. What will happen to employment and total wage payments?

choices.label: Employment Total Wage Payments Increase Indeterminate

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
